spell_list.description: Whenever the raid strikes a death blow, the caster's group will gain increased Multi-Attack Chance and weapon damage bonus. This also has a very small chance to increment when attacking. This increments up to 25 times. It is dispelled when any group member dies. Does not persist through zoning.
spell_list.description_pvp: Whenever the raid strikes a death blow, the caster's group will gain increased Multi-Attack Chance and weapon damage bonus. This also has a very small chance to increment when attacking. This increments up to 25 times. It is dispelled when any group member dies. Does not persist through zoning.

effect_list.description: On any combat or spell hit this spell may cast Eulogy of the Fallen on target.  Lasts for 15 minutes.  Triggers about 0.2 times per minute.
Increases Spell Weapon Damage Bonus of group members (AE) by 0.2
Increases Weapon Damage Bonus of group members (AE) by 0.2
Dispelled when a group member dies.
Increases Multi Attack Chance of group members (AE) by 4.0

spell_list.name: Eulogy of the Fallen
